source: TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_MUTAMIX_000_000<tab>Process of shifty-making is of big help-use. First, be taking five need-not materia, yes? Melty-mix this one, mixy-melt that one, squeeze and squash, then bigeyes! Five need-not are reborn as one shiny-new!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_MUTAMIX_000_000<tab>Kannzu nicht brauchen viele Materia? Muzzu nicht gleich müllwerfen mit Zornigeblick. Mutagenix zeigen neue Meisterkönnen extra für Großwachsene<var 08 E905 (()) ((r)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_MUTAMIX_000_001<tab>What kind of materia is reborn? Such knowings do not rattle Mutamix's braincase. Maybe new materia is worth much jinglyshine; maybe it is even more scrappyjunk than five before. Shifty-making is exciting chance-game, yes?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_MUTAMIX_000_001<tab>Mutagenix kann wechselmischen nichtbrauchen Materia und machen neue! Pssh, sehen schon Leuchten in Augen von Großwachsene<var 08 E905 (()) ((r)) /var>. Gibbzu fünf Materia aus Schweretasche. Mutagenix machen Nützlicheding und kommen Freude in Herz.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Mutamix will perform materia transmutation for you at any time, free of charge. Bring the goblin five pieces of unwanted materia, and he will transform them into a single new piece to use as you see fit.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Wenn du Mutagenix 5 Materia gibst, kann er sie zu einer Materia anderer Art transmutieren.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>That said, materia transmutation remains an inexact science. As for what manner of materia will emerge each time Mutamix works his wonders, not even the goblin genius himself can say.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>Welche Materia du erhältst, wird vom Zufall bestimmt, der Prozess ist aber eine gute Möglichkeit, überflüssige Materia in eine andere Art zu verwandeln, für die du bessere Verwendung hast.
